name.label: OAuth App name
name.description: The name of your OAuth App.

description.label: Description
description.description: A short description of your OAuth App.

homePageUrl.label: Homepage URL
homePageUrl.description: The full URL to your OAuth App’s website.

logo.label: Logo
logo.placeholder: Drag and drop your logo here or click to upload

callbackUrl.label: Callback URL
callbackUrl.description: The full URL to redirect to after a user authorizing your integration.

scopes.label: Scopes
scopes.description: The permissions your OAuth App needs.

secret.label: Client secrets
secret.newDescription: Make sure to copy your new client secret now. You won’t be able to see it again.
secret.empty: You need a client secret to authenticate as the application to the API.

decision.title: {{name}} is requesting access to your account
decision.scopes: This application will be able to get the following scopes:
